comment._content: Opening day of the 1913 World Series, New York Giants vs. Philadelphia Athletics.

comment.author: 38789304@N06
comment._content: Bonita fotografia de gran valor documental e històrico.Saludos.

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Notice that the ballplayers do not have numbers on their uniforms.  In 1916, the Cleveland Indians briefly wore uniforms with numbers on their sleaves.  The first game in which both clubs wore numbers involved the Yankees and Indians in 1929.
